name: classical attitude shawl (larger)
notes:
a beautiful [classical attitude shawl][1] with a great tutorial. 

the, simple and elegant shawl is made using [color kings cotton bomb][2] which is a luscious and soft cake-yarn available in fabulous colour combinations. the crochet pattern for the shawl is simple and makes a beautiful and elegant shawl. the poncho can also be crocheted using hobbii twister. 

also available in sultan deluxe: https://hobbii.com/classical-attitude-shawl-sultan-deluxe?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=classical-attitude-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=swr

enjoy!

**materials:**
- cotton kings color bomb - 1 skein
- crochet hook: g (4.0 mm)

**finished measurements:** 
approx. 73 1⁄4” x 30 3⁄4”
gauge: 4” x 4” = 21 sts x 10 rows.

**abbreviations:**
**ch**: chain
**st**: stitch
**sc**: single crochet
**hdc**: hald double crochet dc: double crochet
**tr**: treble crochet


  [1]: https://hobbii.com/classical-attitude-shawl?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=classical-attitude-shawl&utm_term=swr
  [2]: https://hobbii.com/cotton-kings-color-bomb?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ck-color-bomb&utm_term=swr
